[Page Title: THE GLASS ONION - Home]

THE GLASS ONION Home About Menus Happenings Gift Card Contact Us 
Locally sourced, southern comfort on every plate
View All Menus 
brings his love for Southern comfort food to every dish, supporting local farmers and organizations. His menu is inspired by his roots in Alabama and experiences in New Orleans and the Lowcountry.​
The Glass Onion is one of Charleston’s original Southern home-grown, locally focused, all natural restaurants. Owner and Executive Chef Chris Stewart Located on Savannah Highway. Walk-in dining only. Stop by & grab a seat, we can't wait to serve you! View Gallery Location Walk-in Dining only.  Come see us! Monday - Saturday:  8am-9pm Closed Sunday 1219 Savannah Highway Charleston, SC 29407 843-225-1717 [email protected] A 7% Disposable Container Fee Will Be Added To All Takeout Orders Contact Us Daily Menu Home About Menus Happenings Gift Card Contact Us

[Page Title: Menus - THE GLASS ONION]

THE GLASS ONION Home About Menus Happenings Gift Card Contact Us Breakfast Menu Lunch/Dinner Menu Desserts Kids Menu Beer, Wine, Cocktails ​ Our ever-evolving menu features as many local, all natural, hormone free ingredients as possible; the soulful food that draws influence from Chef Chris Stewart’s southern heritage and family recipes, especially from his grandmother Jennie Ruth; and is available for breakfast, lunch, and dinner Monday-Saturday.​ We are proud to support local farmers, artisans, and organizations: Farmers and Purveyors Ambrose Family Farms Carolina Classic Catfish Charleston Cheese House Cheshire Pork Heritage Farms Crosby’s Seafood Curious Farms Dirt Works Incubator Farm Flying Tricycle
